name: Major Haash'n
Lore: 'Mon Calamari master engineer. Joined the Alliance to fulfill his personal goal of piloting star cruisers.',
Text: 'Deploys -2 to any Star Cruiser. Adds 2 to the power of any capital ship he pilots. When piloting a Star Cruiser, adds 1 to hyperspeed and armor and cancels Lateral Damage targeting a starship at same system.',
